title: Thresh gets no souls from dragons
body:
The new dragons don't drop souls for Thresh.

 :-(

replies.body: Who says evil dragons even have souls?
Only the Dovahkiin can do that.
Obviously you've never played dark souls, dem dragons drop a lot of souls
That's either fixed in 6.10 (patch that just went out) or 6.11 (next patch). Not certain off the top of the head which patch it made it in for, has been addressed though.
